issue.title: [CF 564] DRUID: Harmony aura MoP Change
issue.body:
I was hoping for some help on this one.  I had a button that would warn me that Harmony was about to expire in 5 seconds.  It stopped working with the MoP patch.  I modified it based on the new naming format Wowhead had but it still refuses to work.  I know I am missing something!

I've posted both the old format and the new one.

I greatly appreciate any help you can provide.
